description.value:
When activated, a wardstone is used project a @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.dU9ntCb3obW5GJTM]{Forbiddance} spell over an area. It is not consumed by the spell, but it becomes immobile and cannot be used again until the spell is ended.

A wardstone is close to indestructible, but can be destroyed by the spell @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.057CZWwhMSyXT0M3]{Disintegrate} .
